name: Sunblock Boy
description:
Game & assets created for Mini Jam 76: Radiation.

Controls:

- left mouse to move (click)

- right mouse to use & close pack

When customers are ready for sunscreen, they will change color :- Hold down mouse to apply sunscreen on customers (when they are starting to burn).

It's a hot day at the beach, and you - sunblock boy, are the only thing stopping our avid beach goers from burning to a crisp! The aim of the game is to make as much $$ as you can by applying sunscreen to the beach customer Watch out for seagulls - they are highly trained thieves (but suckers for a chip). Collect Energy drinks to get a boost of speed!
